name: Bob the blob
description:
Neat game made for extra credits game jam right after i got back after presenting a game i worked on at a convention for the first time.

A big thank you to the extra credits crew for being one of the bigger factors in me speccing into game dev and hopefully making many a good games in the future.

sorry about the glitchy graphics and lack of menu, kinda need to sleep and life cought up with me now that it's monday so i didn't have time for all that i wanted to add.
